description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,

after taking a look at the attachment, we decided to block the phishing website that was sent in the suspicious e-mail.

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Dear Dr. Doe,

we have checked the e-mail traffic, however, we do not see exceeding number of email sent or received from your e-mail address, which is suspicious. Please explain yourself.

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? When I visited our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/ an hour ago, I could see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation. Now I suddenly cannot access the website at all.
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings,

we were forced to block the mentioned website because of suspicious activity coming from the website. We are looking into it and we will keep you updated in case the website is unblocked.

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetins,

would it be possible to provide us with an information about people who have access to make changes to the project website ?
Sorry, I'm a project manager without IT background.

description: Email address of Peter Quinn, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Greetings,

We have received complains about a website nice-project.uni.ex. When we checked the logs we noticed that only receivers of this email have accessed the settings part of this website. If possible, we would like to ask you to try to remove the malicious content from the website and check people who have permission to change the website. If the malicious content is not removed, the website will stay blocked.

description: Email address of Lisa Grant, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Greetings,

We have received complains about a website nice-project.uni.ex. When we checked the logs we noticed that only receivers of this email have accessed the settings part of this website. If possible, we would like to ask you to try to remove the malicious content from the website and check people who have permission to change the website. If the malicious content is not removed, the website will stay blocked.

Greetings,
Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.
Should I reinstall my computer???

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

Greetings,

there is no need to reinstall your computer, however if you have used your credentials on the said website, we would recommend you to change them imemdiately.

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Lisa Grant
